details.name: Mziyanda
details.bio: Hi my name is Mziyanda Joko I am a front-end developer with 4 years of experience. I was born in a small town call Noupoort in Northen cape, I am currently living in Cape Town for +16. i am 27 years of age and I beggan passion for coding during my hight school phase, Since then I was sold and wantend to know more and the learning journey nver stpped ever since.I am also a sport person I play Cricket on weekend when i am not coding something awesome like this pdf generator.
